artefact: Register your boat with the coastguard's safety scheme

artefact.overview: Register your boat with the UK coastguard using the Maritime and Coastguard Agency's voluntary safety scheme (CG66)
artefact.more_information:
Your details will be available to Maritime Rescue Co-ordination Centres (MRCCs) throughout the UK.

^You need to update your details every 2 years.^

*[MRCCs]: Maritime Rescue Co-ordination Centres
*[MRCC]: Maritime Rescue Co-ordination Centre
artefact.introduction: Fill out an online form to register your boat's details with the UK coastguard. This is a free service.
artefact.will_continue_on: the Maritime and Coastguard Agency website
artefact.alternate_methods:
$D
[Download the 'Register your boat' registration form (PDF, 353kb)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/documents/digitalasset/dg_184515.pdf "Register your boat - Registration form, PDF, 353kb"){:rel="external"} 
$D

You can also get a form from:

- an HM Coastguard sector base
- a MCA Maritime Office
- a Royal National Lifeboat Institution (RNLI) boathouse
- your local marina or sailing club

*[MCA]: Maritime and Coastguard Agency
*[RNLI]: Royal National Lifeboat Institution
